overview:
Rebecca has a well-rounded business background that began back in 1994 when she graduated from Central Michigan Universityâ€™s School of Accounting. After serving positions in operations, sales, and marketing, Rebecca started her own consulting firm in 2009. With the launch of Web Savvy Marketing, Rebecca is able to focus entirely on leveraging the Internet to help small and mid-market businesses (SMB) achieve improved branding and exceptional sales growth.

Web Savvy Marketing is a boutique internet marketing and public relations firm that specializes in WordPress website design, organic search engine optimization, social media management, copywriting, and email campaign management.
